ISSUE.TITLE: Community pole vote is not counted
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 beta Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) install beta 4.30 2) Go home page scroll and find community poll. 3) give vote in my case i gave excellent but it is not counted. ![24](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41533502/78018674-f0fc8f80-736b-11ea-92c6-660966730bb9.png) ![25](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41533502/78018678-f22dbc80-736b-11ea-99d4-bf8f399a3f72.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #4407 Fixed problem with "store limitation" and "ACL limitation"

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4409 Fixed problem with saving poll vote answer
